cafedansadatabase

Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafedansadatabase.Validation

  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    Validation.java Validates the input of adding and editing Dancer objects. RegEx Patterns were found on Google. The necessary portions of the Dancer that needed validation are the Dancer Name, Phone Number, and Email. All other fields are given as a choice from a JComboBox and do not require such validation. 
      Project: CafeDansa Database
  Platform: jdk 1.8.0_14; NetBeans IDE 8.1; Windows 10
  Course: CS 143
  Created on Apr 12, 2016, 4:34:19 PM
  Revised on Arp 14, 2016, 2:27:35 PM
